metadata.feature_description: Complete folder lifecycle management including creation, deletion, moving, and synchronization with permission controls

steps.action: Navigate to Assets module in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Assets interface should load with folder view
steps.actual: Assets interface loaded successfully showing folder tree

steps.action: Click Add Folder button
steps.expected: Add folder dialog should appear
steps.actual: Add folder dialog appeared with Name and Type fields

steps.action: Enter folder name 'TestFolder_Jan2026' and click Save
steps.expected: Folder should be created and appear in the list
steps.actual: Folder was created successfully and appeared in the folder list

steps.action: Navigate into TestFolder_Jan2026
steps.expected: Should enter the folder and see empty contents
steps.actual: Successfully navigated into the folder

steps.action: Create subfolder named 'SubFolder_Level1'
steps.expected: Nested folder should be created inside the parent folder
steps.actual: SubFolder_Level1 was created successfully inside TestFolder_Jan2026

steps.action: Attempt to create folder with invalid characters 'Test/Folder:Invalid*Name'
steps.expected: System should reject the invalid folder name with appropriate error
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'The folder name contains invalid characters. Please use a name that does not include \:/*?"<>|'

steps.action: Navigate to Home folder and create FolderToDelete
steps.expected: Folder should be created
steps.actual: FolderToDelete created successfully

steps.action: Click delete icon on FolderToDelete
steps.expected: Delete confirmation dialog should appear
steps.actual: Delete confirmation dialog appeared asking to confirm deletion

steps.action: Confirm deletion
steps.expected: Folder should be deleted and removed from list
steps.actual: Folder was deleted successfully and no longer appears in the list

steps.action: Delete TestFolder_Jan2026 which contains SubFolder_Level1
steps.expected: Delete confirmation should warn about folder contents
steps.actual: Delete confirmation appeared for folder with contents

steps.action: Confirm deletion
steps.expected: Folder and all its contents should be deleted recursively
steps.actual: Folder and all subfolders were deleted successfully

steps.action: Create TestNewFolder2026 and click move icon
steps.expected: Move folder dialog should appear with destination tree
steps.actual: Move folder dialog appeared showing all available destinations

steps.action: Select Images folder as destination and click Move
steps.expected: Folder should be moved to Images folder
steps.actual: Folder was moved successfully - no longer appears in root

steps.action: Navigate to Images folder to verify
steps.expected: TestNewFolder2026 should appear inside Images folder
steps.actual: TestNewFolder2026 is now inside Images folder

steps.action: Click 'Sync this folder and subfolders' button on Home folder
steps.expected: Folder should synchronize with file system
steps.actual: Synchronization completed - folder list refreshed with updated content

steps.action: Verify sync button performs recursive synchronization
steps.expected: Sync should include all subfolders
steps.actual: The sync button tooltip indicates 'Sync this folder and subfolders' confirming recursive behavior

steps.action: Open Add Folder dialog and examine Type dropdown
steps.expected: Should show available folder mapping types
steps.actual: Type dropdown shows: Standard, Secure, Database, Box, Dropbox

steps.action: Click Type dropdown to expand options
steps.expected: All folder mapping types should be visible
steps.actual: All 5 folder types displayed: Standard, Secure, Database, Box_639024605374476375, Dropbox_639024623698967086

steps.action: Select Secure type and create folder 'SecureFolderTest2026'
steps.expected: Secure folder should be created with lock icon
steps.actual: SecureFolderTest2026 created with lock icon indicating secure folder type

steps.action: Review code for UnlinkAllowedStatus functionality
steps.expected: Feature should exist in delete folder functionality
steps.actual: DeleteFolderRequest.cs contains UnlinkAllowedStatus property used for cloud storage folder unlinking

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - Empty folder name validation

steps.action: Click Save without entering folder name
steps.expected: Validation error should appear
steps.actual: Error message 'Text is required' displayed

steps.action: Enter whitespace-only folder name and click Save
steps.expected: Should be rejected as empty
steps.actual: Whitespace-only name rejected with 'Text is required' message

steps.action: Attempt to create folder named 'Images' (which already exists)
steps.expected: System should prevent duplicate folder names
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Cannot create folder (Images), folder already exists in this location.'

observations: Folder mapping types available include Standard, Secure, Database, Box, and Dropbox integrations
UnlinkAllowedStatus feature exists in code (DeleteFolderRequest.cs) for handling cloud storage folder unlinking during deletion
Folder synchronization always operates recursively (includes subfolders) as indicated by the button tooltip

Very long folder names are supported - a folder named 'ThisIsAVeryLongFolderNameToTestTheBoundaryLimitsOfTheFolderCreationFeatureInDNNAssetManagerAndSeeWhatHappensWhenWeExceedTypicalLengthLimitsForFileSystemPaths' exists in the system
Invalid characters for folder names are: \:/*?"<>|
Hover icons (edit, move, delete) on folder cards do not appear in the accessibility tree but are functional via direct interaction
